name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Experience the next level of noise-canceling technology with the Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones. Featuring industry-leading noise cancellation, premium sound quality, and all-day comfort.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: Escape into your music with the Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones. Enjoy unparalleled noise cancellation, immersive sound, and a lightweight, comfortable design.

name: Sennheiser HD 660 S
description: Elevate your listening experience with the Sennheiser HD 660 S headphones. Featuring high-resolution sound, premium materials, and a timeless design.

name: Audio-Technica ATH-M50xBT
description: Enjoy wireless freedom without compromising on sound quality with the Audio-Technica ATH-M50xBT headphones. Experience studio-quality sound wherever you go.

name: Beats Studio3 Wireless
description: Immerse yourself in the music with the Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones. Featuring adaptive noise cancellation, Apple W1 chip for seamless connectivity, and up to 22 hours of battery life.

name: Sony WH-XB900N
description: Experience powerful, bass-driven sound with the Sony WH-XB900N headphones. Enjoy long listening sessions in comfort with their ergonomic design and wireless connectivity.
